新世紀福音戰士劇場版 AIR/將真心獻給你

Having prevented the Third Impact and thus saving the planet, NERV unexpectedly finds itself under attack. Conscious of Gendo's betrayal, SEELE launches a massive raid towards Tokyo-3 in order to conclude the Human Instrumentality Project at any cost. NERV must now fight its most fearsome opponent: mankind itself.
"Thanatos -If I Can't Be Yours-" by Loren & Mash
